thread.title: MusicNews | 29 hardcore pop fan tattoos - featuring Hozier, Ed Sheeran, Taylor Swift, Jedward & more
thread.title_full: MusicNews | 29 hardcore pop fan tattoos - featuring Hozier, Ed Sheeran, Taylor Swift, Jedward & more - entertainment.ie

author: Lauren Murphy
title: MusicNews | 29 hardcore pop fan tattoos - featuring Hozier, Ed Sheeran, Taylor Swift, Jedward & more
text:
There's absolutely nothing wrong with commemorating your love of a band or artist in ink form; often, music tattoos can be quite beautiful, particularly when they hold a special personal meaning to you.
However, when that particular band or artist has only been around for a year or two, you can't blame people for raising an eyebrow. Yes, we mean you , Hozier/Ed Sheeran fans.
Then again, who are we to judge? Check out a selection of some of the best (and worst) tattoos we've uncovered on Instagram - and let us know via Twitter if you have your own music tattoo and what it means to you. We might even feature yours in our next round-up.
1. Hozier fans are hardcore. You know you've made it when a fan gets your logo tattooed on their wrist:
2. …. or lyrics from your song ' Run' on your ribs and arm.
3. Some fans go for the more obvious route (' Jackie & Wilson' is a Hozier song, btw, which references the soul singer of the same name):
4. Others just get you to sign their arm and then get that tattooed.
5. Let's move on to Ed Sheeran . This Instagram user has both logos of his two albums (+ and x) tattooed, as well as a portrait of his face , and his signature on her leg. Whoah.
6. This lady got lyrics from his song ' Give Me Love ' on her chest:
7. This girl got lyrics from 'The A Team':
8. This one has lyrics from ' Thinking Out Loud'.
9. This one is… well, if you're gonna get an Ed Sheeran tattoo, might as well go the whole hog, right?
10. Sam Smith is big news in the world of pop tattoos too, y'know. This tasteful cassette tape is surrounded by lyrics from his song 'Stay With Me' :
11. Other fans prefer to go down the 'autograph' route.
12. If Hozier, Ed Sheeran and Sam Smith fans are ardent enough to get tattoos of their favourite acts, then surely Taylor Swift fans are, too, right? You betcha.
13. Swifties don't mess around.
14. Swifties go hard.
15. You don't mess with the squad.
16. #slightlyterrifying
17. While we're on the topic of Taylor Swift, someone out there has the name of her DJ boyfriend tattooed on their arm.
18.People like Bruno Mars enough to get his face tattooed on their arm, too.
19. And Rihanna , too.
20. … in a variety of different poses.
21. We know what you're thinking. There's gotta be someone out there with a Beyoncé tattoo, right? Right.
23. This Beyoncé tattoo is actually really beautiful.
24. This one is… different.
25. This is Beyoncé , too. (Apparently?)
26. This is a Jedward tattoo. Yes, people have Jedward tattoos. Yes, really.
27. This particular person has several, in fact. That's what you call commitment.
28. Another one? Sure why not.
29. Finally, as Justin Bieber has just revealed the title of his new album ' Purpose' with a stomach tattoo , we'll leave you with this:
MORE: Pics: Conor McGregor just added two more tattoos to his chest
